duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell industry-leading products through retail stores and phone to achieve sales budget attainment
Develop and maintain customer relationships within community organizations and the local business community
Market and sell in a multi-product environment, focusing on cross selling and customer retention
Assist customers, complete marketing activities, and support office operations under the guidance of an Agent or Lead Sales Agent
Monitor key competitors in the local market area and make suggestions to improve the company's position in the marketplace
Responsible for sales administration and reporting activities
